title: Five-Star Beachfront Luxury on Indonesia’s Hidden Gem
description: Whisk your other half away for a tropical island getaway unlike any other. Flores Island is Indonesia’s best-kept secret, home to stunning scenery, azure-blue seas and so much more. AYANA Komodo Resort is the island’s newest addition and boasts an amazing beachfront location on Waecicu Beach. Here, your troubles will feel a world away as you relax with daily buffet breakfast, snorkelling and paddleboard hire, access to an exclusive private island, a decadent dinner, a blissful 30-minute massage, late 1pm checkout and more.
offer_address: Pantai Waecicu, Labuan Bajo, Kab, Kabupaten Manggarai Barat, Nusa Tenggara Tim. 86554, Indonesia

title: Komodo Dragons & Sensational Snorkelling: A 3-Day Cruise in Indonesia
description: Discover the charming fishing town of Labuan Bajo, perched on an enchanting harbourside on Indonesia’s striking Flores Island and the launchpad to see the famed Komodo National Park dragons. Discover the world-famous creatures and explore the striking underwater world of some of Indonesia’s lesser-known islands on a luxury, three-day cruise. Includes visits to Komodo Island and Rinca Island; all meals; a private cabin and ensuite bathroom; a local, English-speaking tour guide; snorkelling gear and liability insurance.
